name: Milligan v. Donegal Mutual Insurance Company, Appellant

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boic and Eagen, JJ.
parties: Milligan v. Donegal Mutual Insurance Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of the late Judge Thomas M. Marshall, of the court below.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: E. A. Robinson, with him Robert E. Way man, Donald E. Orr, and Dickie, McCamey, Chilcote & Robinson, for appellant.
John A. Metz, Jr., with him Guy L. TFarman, and Metz, Cook, Hanna & Kelly, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Milligan v. Donegal Mutual Insurance Company, Appellant.
November 15, 1960:
Argued October 5, 1960.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boic and Eagen, JJ.
reargument refused December 5, 1960.
E. A. Robinson, with him Robert E. Way man, Donald E. Orr, and Dickie, McCamey, Chilcote & Robinson, for appellant.
John A. Metz, Jr., with him Guy L. TFarman, and Metz, Cook, Hanna & Kelly, for appellee.
